item.title: Tapping Your Fingers on Table Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I'm trying to find someone who can tap their fingers on a table for an hour 60. You can do this while you work, relax, study, watch a movie or anything in the background.

This doesn't have to be something you have to record in one period of time. You can record several 10 minute videos and combine them into an hour if it's easier for you. As long as each video is different.

I'm trying to find someone who can tap in smooth patterns really easily and loudly, similar to the video example here:

https://youtube.com/clip/Ugkxj0GAzcVG1NB6AOqs20B_hx2dfFwoJpYO?si=Bp6_khRM5C8hs1Eh

It's hard finding someone who can tap like this, so sending even a 10 second proposal of similar tapping would really help me find the right person for this, but it's not required. I added preferred camera angles for this video because I prefer the tapping being really close to the camera.

Hoping this will be easy and fun for someone to do and I'm hoping maybe to find someone I can keep going back to for this.

Thank you to anyone interested! Ask anything anytime!

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 18, 2024 03:11 UTC
Category: Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Editing of 1 hour 30 min Podcast Video - Upwork
item.description:
I have a 1 hour and 30 mins. podcast video to be edited. Initial editing has already been done, however editing to upgrade it is required including:
1. Editing of sound and video.
2. Inclusion of appropriate b-roll clips.
3. Inclusion of side profile clips etc.
4. Inclusion of graphics and/or animation.
5. Review for content quality including: removal of silence pauses or repetitive words/phrases.
6. Ensure 4 k quality and saved as mp4.

Example can be found here
www.alonrad.com


Provide example of your work.


Budget: $50

item.title: Video Editor for Promo Video - Upwork
item.description:
Position: Video Editor

Project: Promo Video for RoseGxld Promotions (45 Seconds)

Deadline: 24 hours from hiring

Description:

We are seeking a talented video editor to create a 45-second promo video for RoseGxld Promotions, designed for Instagram Reels (1080x1920). The project requires a fast turnaround of 24 hours from the time of hiring. The final video should feature dynamic and engaging effects and animations.

Responsibilities:

Edit the provided footage into a high-energy, visually appealing 45-second promo video.

This promo is to promote their 4th of July party. Use some soundbites from the models as well telling people to come to the 4th of July party.


Incorporate the song “DaBaby & Sexyy Red - SHAKE SUMN (REMIX) (AUDIO)"  as the background music.
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WaQjv5BT2Uk

Add a variety of cool effects and animations to enhance the video.

Ensure the video is optimized for Instagram Reels (1080x1920).

Deliverables:

Final exported video (45 Seconds, 1080x1920)
Editing sequence/project file must be edited on Adobe Premiere Pro

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio showcasing similar projects.
Proficiency in video editing software on Adobe Premiere Pro
Ability to work quickly and efficiently to meet tight deadlines.
Strong creative skills to apply dynamic effects and animations.
Familiarity with Instagram Reels format and requirements.

Application Process:

Please provide links to your portfolio or previous work relevant to this project.
Confirm your availability to complete the video within 24 hours of hiring.
Include a brief description of your approach to editing promo videos and incorporating effects, animations, and music.

Example Video:
Here is a link to an example video that illustrates the desired style:
https://we.tl/t-W6wC7dnRk9

Footage:
Here is the link to the footage that needs to be edited:
(Footage Uploading, Coming Soon)


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 18, 2024 02:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for my Documentary Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
FLUENT SPOKEN SPANISH + INTERMEDIATE ENGLISH ARE A MUST

We are seeking a talented and creative Documentary YouTube Channel Editor to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the editing and post-production process of our documentary-style video content. You will work closely with the Director of Digital Content Strategy and the production team to create compelling, high-quality videos that engage our audience and align with our channel's vision.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Video Editing
   - Edit raw footage to create compelling, well-paced, and engaging documentary-style videos
   - Collaborate with the Director of Digital Content Strategy to understand the creative vision and ensure that the final edits align with the channel's goals
   - Select the best shots, angles, and sequences to effectively convey the intended message and story
   - Ensure consistency in style, tone, and pacing throughout the videos

2. Post-Production
   - Perform color correction, audio mixing, and sound design to enhance the overall quality of the videos
   - Add appropriate graphics, animations, and text overlays to support the narrative and visual appeal
   - Optimize videos for YouTube, including formatting, compression, and resolution settings
   - Ensure that all videos meet the channel's quality standards and YouTube's technical requirements

3. Collaboration and Communication
   - Work closely with the production team, including the Director of Digital Content Strategy, scriptwriters, and videographers, to provide feedback and suggestions for improvement
   - Attend creative meetings and contribute ideas to enhance the storytelling and visual impact of the videos
   - Communicate effectively with team members to ensure a smooth and efficient post-production process
   - Address feedback and make necessary revisions to the edits based on input from the Director of Digital Content Strategy and other stakeholders

4. Asset Management and Organization
   - Maintain an organized library of video assets, including raw footage, project files, and final edits
   - Develop and implement a file naming and folder structure system to ensure easy access and retrieval of assets
   - Regularly back up and archive project files to prevent data loss

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a video editor, preferably in the documentary or YouTube content creation space
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques, including color correction, audio mixing, and sound design
- Excellent storytelling skills and the ability to create engaging, narrative-driven videos
- Familiarity with YouTube's best practices, trends, and optimization strategies
- Strong attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Creative problem-solving abilities and a willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and techniques


If you have a passion for creating compelling documentary content and a proven track record in video editing, we'd love to hear from you.  Remember:

FLUENT SPOKEN SPANISH + INTERMEDIATE ENGLISH ARE A MUST

Budget: $800
Posted On: June 18, 2024 02:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, YouTube Development, Documentary
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, YouTube Development, Documentary
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok and YouTube Short Repurposing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a YouTube and TikTok Video Editor and Marketer to repurpose existing videos into YouTube Shorts and TikTok content, with a primary focus on growing subscribers.


**Responsibilities:**

- Download existing videos from our YouTube channel and other sources as needed.

- Edit videos into compelling YouTube Shorts and TikTok videos optimized for each platform's format and audience.

- Create captivating titles, descriptions, and tags for each video to improve visibility and SEO.

- Schedule and post at least one YouTube Short and one TikTok video per day to ensure consistent engagement and growth.

- Utilize SEO strategies, tags, and keywords to enhance video discoverability and attract a wider audience.

- Monitor video performance metrics and audience engagement to optimize content strategies.

- Collaborate closely with our content team to align video content with overall marketing objectives.

- Implement monetization strategies and initiatives to increase revenue from YouTube and TikTok channels.


**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in video editing, with a focus on YouTube and TikTok content creation.

- Strong understanding of YouTube and TikTok platforms, including SEO, tags, and algorithm dynamics.

- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.

- Ability to create engaging, high-quality video content that resonates with target audiences.

- Familiarity with analytics tools to track and interpret video performance metrics.

- Excellent organizational skills and ability to manage multiple projects efficiently.

- Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively in a remote team environment.


**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Previous experience in social media marketing or digital content creation.

- Knowledge of current trends and best practices in YouTube Shorts and TikTok content creation.

- Understanding of monetization strategies and tactics to maximize revenue from YouTube and TikTok channels.

If this is you, we'll look forward to hearing from you.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 02:34 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Development, TikTok Marketing, TikTok Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Development, TikTok Marketing, TikTok Video
Country: United States
click to apply
